title:
Exactly what was accomplished by requiring anyone operating a moped, dirt bike, go-cart, motorized grocery store cart, golf cart, wheel chair, skateboard, bicycle, to join those on roads already completely congested with cars, trucks and the occasional airplane, of Wilmington to spend $18 for a license plate (and selectively so)other than creating a revenue stream?



Thanks! H
text: Hello. Here's some background on the new law. MyReporter canÍt speculate on the reasons why it was enacted. http://www.newsobserver.com/news/traffic/article25496647.html
